# swapper

## Installation

You can install the development version of swapper from
[GitHub](https://github.com/milanmlft/swapper) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("milanmlft/swapper")
```

# Package index

## All functions

- [`simulateDE()`](https://milanmlft.github.io/swapper/reference/simulateDE.md)
  : Simulate DE by swapping features

### All vignettes

- [Introduction to
  swapper](https://milanmlft.github.io/swapper/articles/swapper.md):
